name: Pixel Royale (itch)
description:
In this project we wanted to start an indie video game company, which ended up failing, but we got to have almost 100% defined the GDD of our video game for mobile platforms Pixel Royale. The team who realized it:

- Victor Valls - Artist

- Pau Medina - Level Designer

- Joan Lluis Mudarra - Game Designer

The videogame was supposed to be a Battle Royale for mobile platforms with a component of randomness collecting boxes like  Mario Kart and getting the loot there. You can check all the GDD for check all the videogame functionalities.
